pages.text: 39|57|Athaba ke'u yena na bale, ‘haya! Allaha amake hidayata karale ami to abasya'i muttakidera antarbhukta hatama.
39|58|Athaba sasti dekhate pele yena ka'uke'o balate na haya, ‘haya! Yadi ekabara ami phire yete paratama tabe ami muhasinadera antarbhukta hatama
39|59|hyam, abasya'i amara nidarsana tomara kache esechila, kintu tumi egulote mithyaropa karechile ebam ahankara karechile; ara tumi chile kaphiradera antarbhukta.
39|60|Ara yara allahara prati mithya aropa kare, apani kiyamatera dina tadera ceharasamuha kalo dekhabena. Ahankaridera abasasthala ki jahannama naya
39|61|ara yara taka'oya abalambana kareche, allah‌ taderake ud'dhara karabena tadera saphalyasaha; taderake amangala sparsa karabe na ebam tara cintita'o habe na.
39|62|Allaha saba kichura srasta ebam tini samasta kichura tattbabadhayaka.
39|63|Asamanasamuha o yaminera cabisamuha tamra'i kache [1]. Ara yara allahara ayatasamuhake asbikara kare tara'i ksatigrasta.
39|64|Baluna, 'he ajnara! Tomara ki amake allaha chara an'yera ibadata karate nirdesa diccha

39|65|Ara apanara prati o apanara purbabartidera prati abasya'i ohi kara hayeche ye, 'yadi apani sirka karena tabe apanara samasta amala to nisphala habe ebam abasya'i apani habena ksatigrastadera antarbhukta.
39|66|Baram apani allahara'i ibadata karuna ebam krtajnadera antarbhukta hona.

39|67|Ara tara allahake yathocita sam'mana kareni athaca kiyamatera dina samasta yamina thakabe tamra hatera muthite ebam asamanasamuha thakabe bhamja kara abasthaya tamra dana hate [1]. Pabitra o mahana tini, tara yaderake sarika kare tini tadera urdhbe.
